description: Section 73 application to vary Condition 2 (Development in accordance with Approved Plans) to include Use Class A1, A2 or A3 of instead of B1a Use attached to planning permission 18/01394/FUL dated 24.07.2018 which granted permission for:"Re-development of site to provide a mixed-use scheme comprising of: B1(a) ground floor use in the Grade II Listed former public house, and eight residential units in total (three units in the former public house and five units in a new build residential element infilling the space in between No.98 and No.92 High Street). Repair and refurbishment of Grade II Listed former public house building, including second floor rear extension to facilitate delivery of residential units. Provision of associated refuse and cycle storage, amenity space, and landscaping (Application site is a Grade II Listed Building - Coach and Horses Public House)".
